div.div: School Dismissal Extended Through Remainder of School Year
Please use email to make contact or call 801-610-8400 between 8am-12noon M-F

div.class: wpb_row vc_row-fluid full-width-content vc_row vc_row-o-equal-height vc_row-flex vc_row-o-content-middle standard_section
vc_col-sm-3 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col centered-text padding-2-percent

div.p: Stay current with ASD and school events

div.class: vc_col-sm-3 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col centered-text padding-2-percent
vc_col-sm-3 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col centered-text padding-2-percent
vc_col-sm-3 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col centered-text padding-2-percent

div.p: Learn about our Mission and Vision for Learning

div.class: vc_col-sm-12 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col has-animation padding-2-percent

div.h3: Â Â Visit our video library to see coverage of the latest events in Alpine School District!Â Â Visit Now

div.class: vc_col-sm-12 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col padding-3-percent

blockquote.p: I appreciate Alpine's great website and transparent information. It is easy to navigate and has accessible information for the public like financials.
blockquote.span: Sydnee Dickson, Utah Superintendent of Schools

blockquote.p: Thank you Alpine District for providing wonderful teachers and safe classrooms for our kids!
I love Alpine School District! Thank you to all who serve and work to better the education of our children and grandchildren.

In the age of school choice, district communication leaders need to be become marketers, and Alpine's website does a great job of making the district feel like a place I would want my children to attend.
blockquote.span: John Jennings, Managing Editor, Advancing K12 EDTECH

div.div:
Alpine School District 575 N 100 E
American Fork, UT
Office Hours Monday - Friday
8:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m.
(801) 610-8400

a.p: How can I donate to ASD?

li.class: megamenu columns-4 menu-item menu-item-type-custom menu-item-object-custom menu-item-has-children menu-item-24142

li.a: Find special programs for my student?
Apply for free and reduced lunch?
Find school bus stops and boundaries?

div.p: View the Clear Creek Camp Schedule in the âRegistration FAQsâ document. We recommend selecting a few dates in case your first choice sells out.

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-09eb150 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-inner-section

div.p: Once registration is open, click âEventbrite Registrationâ and select the date of your choice.

div.p: Fill in all requested student registration information and pay the required registration fee.
